page.title: 17LIKES AND DISLIKES - PART 1
page.content: The thing I like most is watching television. My favourite programme is Dallas. I like it because it's not funny and it's serious. My favourite food is Italian food because I absolutely love Spaghetti Bolognaise and Pizzas. Another thing I like doing best is playing Snooker, but when I play against my dad he always wins by miles. There's other games I like playing such as Beware of the Spider, but the battery has run out. I like playing Connect Four and Tell Me. I really liked Beware of the Spider best because the spider jumps up on you when you touch the board with the metal tweezer. My favourite subject at school is Reading and English, and Playtimes. Another thing I like doing is eating. When I'm not eating Italian Food I like 'hamwiches' and chips.
